body: I was told my CL was too risky for 1.7 and it was marked for 1.8 and I understand the concern about including such a fix into 1.7 at this point.  The CL is mentioned in the original issue #15823.  What options are there other than waiting for Go 1.8?  I assume there will be a Go 1.7.1 but how long before that comes out.
